fields.author: By Jerry Bissorop
fields.content:
April 8, 1958
Intoxicating smoke may cause cancer in mice. A New York University researcher has found that when he fed his lab animals a mixture of tobacco tar and nicotine for two years they developed lung tumors similar to those seen in humans who have smoked cigarettes.
